name: Coris
headline: Risk Infra for SaaS companies and Fintechs that Underwrite SMBs
description: Coris is a Risk API for SaaS companies and Fintechs that underwrite SMBs. We built the risk systems at eBay, PayPal, WePay, and Google. Leveraging our expertise, we were able to build the product in less than 3 months, launch it within few weeks, and already have live pilots with companies such as Housecall Pro and Wave Accounting

founders.name: Vinodh Poyyapakkam, Founder
founders.description: Payments Fraud, SMB, Risk & Compliance. Prev: Google, WePay, Paysafe, PayPal, Accenture

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/6570f033beae2d428c9f452b_Circles.png)
# Your trusted platform for merchant
onboarding
fraud prevention
underwriting
monitoring
Protect your merchants and your bottom line. Software platforms and fintechs use Coris’s AI-powered risk management platform to verify businesses and mitigate risks throughout the customer lifecycle.
[Get Started](https://coris.ai/</contact-us>)
[Get Started](https://coris.ai/</contact-us>)
trusted by
The problem
## Merchant risk management is stuck in the past.
### Unstructured merchant data is growing exponentially, but there’s no way to analyze it systematically.
### AI is enabling more sophisticated fraud, and risk teams are constantly playing catch-up.
### Existing risk tools work in siloes, creating important gaps.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e36eb435832cb7759bde2f_Left%20Arrow%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e36eb4f4cd93ecdec88d43_Right%20Arrow.png)
## Introducing the Coris platform
Unified platform empowering teams to manage risk across the merchant lifecycle
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e37b89fbceb8b6924a6f77_Group%2012671.png)
### 30% 
reduction in losses in year one
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e37bbb88861e790bd0e95d_Group%201458.png)
### <5 seconds
time to underwrite
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e37c0c6d7b1f6971827b74_Group%201456.png)
### 80% 
reduction in manual reviews
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e37be00e1ccc0c4ad85086_Group%2012662.png)
### 5x ROI
in year one
## Unlock intelligent merchant growth
Say goodbye to limited data coverage, difficult integrations, and manual searches. MerchantProfiler offers the most comprehensive merchant data intelligence on the market. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/6570f033beae2d428c9f4530_Group%201181.png)
#### Industry Classification
Auto-predict MCC & six-digit NAICS industry classification codes, powered by LLMs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e80fe9579cea532d080e0e_Icon%20-%20MerchantVision.png)
#### MerchantVision
Automate business site inspections using Google Street View and AI
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e80fd9ad44d7ecdb079e6a_siterating.png)
#### SiteRating
Rate merchant websites via analysis of stock images, domains, product data, and more
## Stop fraud at sign-up
Leverage the world’s first merchant fraud model that detects third-party and first-party fraud at sign-up. Automatically identify fraudulent applications and reduce onboarding friction for legitimate businesses. 
## Block suspicious payments in real-time
Move faster with the first ACH fraud model purpose-built for software platforms. Instantly score Stripe Connect-powered payments for their return likelihood, decreasing fraud losses.
## Why teams love Coris
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/6570f033beae2d428c9f4542_Group%201228.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e302c6232df479433f3ca8_Group%201191.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e302a12f27fa996534d018_Vector.png)
The opportunity to work with Vinodh and team was what really sold us on Coris. If you’re running a company that monitors thousands of sellers, you need a strong, continuous view of your portfolio across multiple touch points. **Coris is the only solution I’ve come across that does that, and the team is consistently committed to making the product experience better.**
[ Read Case Study![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66dfb166aa3bd705bacb3081_Right%20Arrow.svg)](https://coris.ai/<https:/www.coris.ai/blog/kajabi-consolidates-payments-risk-monitoring-activities-with-coris?utm_source=coris+website&utm_medium=testimonial&utm_campaign=CTA>)
#### Marty Chanes
Sr. Payments Risk Manager
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4487/66e2edab60d445638460b58b_Kajabi%20dark%20logo.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e302c6232df479433f3ca8_Group%201191.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e302a12f27fa996534d018_Vector.png)
Coris has been a game changer for our Risk team. Using their product, **we started****instantly approving 90% of business****applications, eliminating unnecessary friction for our good customers**. Coris’s SMB intelligence data has also reduced our application review time by over 75%. I highly recommend Coris to any Risk team looking to offer a high quality customer experience while efficiently identifying SMB fraud.
[Read Case Study![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66dfb166aa3bd705bacb3081_Right%20Arrow.svg)](https://coris.ai/<#>)
#### Anurag Puranik
Head of Credit & Risk
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4487/6570f033beae2d428c9f4489_coast.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e302c6232df479433f3ca8_Group%201191.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e302a12f27fa996534d018_Vector.png)
Our team **saves 15 hours of SMB onboarding work** every week using Coris. MerchantProfiler’s SiteRating analysis and worldwide SMB data coverage has automated a lot of our manual processes. This frees up my team’s time to focus on even higher leverage risk responsibilities. Our customers benefit too, with much faster onboarding decisions.
[Read Case Study![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66dfb166aa3bd705bacb3081_Right%20Arrow.svg)](https://coris.ai/<https:/www.coris.ai/blog/stenn-saves-15-hours-in-smb-onboarding-every-week-with-coris?utm_source=coris+website&utm_medium=testimonial&utm_campaign=CTA>)
#### Yaz Sejari
Financial Crime & Risk Business Analyst
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4487/66f0f8c1fd281cd72b38d5e4_Stenn%20dark%20logo.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e302c6232df479433f3ca8_Group%201191.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e302a12f27fa996534d018_Vector.png)
Coris’s ACH risk model has really elevated our fraud prevention strategy. It’s the only tool to systematically analyze the riskiness of ACH transactions and **drive down ACH fraud losses**. The Coris team’s also been very receptive to our feedback – it’s clear they’ve built this tool with software platforms’ pain points in mind.
[Read Case Study![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66dfb166aa3bd705bacb3081_Right%20Arrow.svg)](https://coris.ai/<#>)
#### Zack Sullivan
Head of Finance
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4487/66e2edc0ba5ae100a5787dbc_Hearth%20dark%20logo.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e302c6232df479433f3ca8_Group%201191.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e302a12f27fa996534d018_Vector.png)
Coris has greatly contributed to our risk management strategy, and has **shortened our alert review time by 55%**. The product’s highly customizable nature means that we can tailor risk alerts to our unique SMB demographic, which is impossible to do in other tools. The team has been very responsive to our needs and is now a valuable partner for our Risk team at Stax.
[Read Case Study![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66dfb166aa3bd705bacb3081_Right%20Arrow.svg)](https://coris.ai/<#>)

## Applicable across the merchant journey
[Pre-qualification](https://coris.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Onboarding](https://coris.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Merchant Fraud](https://coris.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Underwriting](https://coris.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[Transaction Monitoring](https://coris.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)[Merchant Monitoring](https://coris.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-5>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e3808a8298a733522bae02_Icon%20-%20Address.png)
Pre-qualification
Business and data science teams need to efficiently qualify incoming leads and prioritize outreach. With MerchantProfiler, teams instantly receive merchant lead data: KYB checks, industry classification, website & social media analysis. With the Coris platform, teams can generate custom rules and actions on this data to rank and reach out to leads accordingly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e380b8795e8750684c7543_Icon%20-%20Industry%20Classification.png)
Onboarding
Onboarding teams need to make sense of multiple merchant data sources and decide on applications quickly. The Coris platform enables teams to combine merchant data from multiple sources (Stripe, Adyen, etc.), set up custom rules based on this data, and automate actions. Reduce friction for good merchants while streamlining reviews for suspicious applications.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e380f0e1192fc2ad4fcdf8_Icon%20-%20first%20party%20\(1\).png)
Merchant Fraud
With fraud on the rise, risk teams need to quickly assess new merchant applications for signs of questionable identity or intent. CorShield reduces third-party and first-party fraud by cross-checking an application's information against all known information on the business. For example, it can assess the likelihood that a given email address, phone number, or mailing address is actually controlled by the business.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e38140775ecfa79011f488_Group%201000002601.png)
Underwriting
Underwriters are under pressure to make decisions quickly, and sometimes critical risk checks are overlooked. The Coris platform's rule engine eliminates the risk of manual errors by automating checks and actions, increasing accuracy and efficiency.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e3817145495552c700647e_Group%2012677.png)
Transaction Monitoring
Fraudulent ACH returns - aka "friendly fraud" - negatively impact merchants and the software platforms that serve them. Our ACH fraud model automatically triangulates known information on payments and payers, and generates a score predicting the likelihood that the ACH payment might be returned.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e381b6d3b3b4bdd2bd9000_Icon%20-%20Commercial%20Credit%20\(1\).png)
Merchant Monitoring
Risk management doesn’t stop at onboarding. Risk teams can use the Coris platform to stay on top of suspicious activity by setting up custom alerts and checks for key events. For example, when a merchant initiates a payout, risk teams can check their chargeback history on Stripe Connect or Adyen for Platforms before deciding to release the payout.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e37c0c6d7b1f6971827b74_Group%201456.png)
### 80% 
reduction in manual reviews
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e37be00e1ccc0c4ad85086_Group%2012662.png)
### 5x ROI
in year one
## Unlock intelligent merchant growth
Say goodbye to limited data coverage, difficult integrations, and manual searches. MerchantProfiler offers the most comprehensive merchant data intelligence on the market. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/6570f033beae2d428c9f4530_Group%201181.png)
#### Industry Classification
Auto-predict MCC & six-digit NAICS industry classification codes, powered by LLMs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e80fe9579cea532d080e0e_Icon%20-%20MerchantVision.png)
#### MerchantVision
Automate business site inspections using Google Street View and AI
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e80fd9ad44d7ecdb079e6a_siterating.png)
#### SiteRating
Rate merchant websites via analysis of stock images, domains, product data, and more
## Stop fraud at sign-up
Leverage the world’s first merchant fraud model that detects third-party and first-party fraud at sign-up. Automatically identify fraudulent applications and reduce onboarding friction for legitimate businesses. 
## Block suspicious payments in real-time
Move faster with the first ACH fraud model purpose-built for software platforms. Instantly score Stripe Connect-powered payments for their return likelihood, decreasing fraud losses.
## Why teams love Coris
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/6570f033beae2d428c9f4542_Group%201228.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e302c6232df479433f3ca8_Group%201191.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e302a12f27fa996534d018_Vector.png)

If you’re running a company that monitors thousands of sellers, you need a strong, continuous view of your portfolio across multiple touch points. **Coris is the only solution I’ve come across that does that, and the team is consistently committed to making the product experience better.**

## Applicable across the merchant journey
Pre-qualification⟨14⟩Onboarding⟨15⟩Merchant Fraud⟨16⟩Underwriting⟨17⟩Transaction Monitoring⟨18⟩Merchant Monitoring⟨19⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e3808a8298a733522bae02_Icon%20-%20Address.png)
Pre-qualification
Business and data science teams need to efficiently qualify incoming leads and prioritize outreach. With MerchantProfiler, teams instantly receive merchant lead data: KYB checks, industry classification, website & social media analysis. With the Coris platform, teams can generate custom rules and actions on this data to rank and reach out to leads accordingly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e380b8795e8750684c7543_Icon%20-%20Industry%20Classification.png)
Onboarding
Onboarding teams need to make sense of multiple merchant data sources and decide on applications quickly. The Coris platform enables teams to combine merchant data from multiple sources (Stripe, Adyen, etc.), set up custom rules based on this data, and automate actions. Reduce friction for good merchants while streamlining reviews for suspicious applications.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e380f0e1192fc2ad4fcdf8_Icon%20-%20first%20party%20\(1\).png)
Merchant Fraud
With fraud on the rise, risk teams need to quickly assess new merchant applications for signs of questionable identity or intent. CorShield reduces third-party and first-party fraud by cross-checking an application's information against all known information on the business. For example, it can assess the likelihood that a given email address, phone number, or mailing address is actually controlled by the business.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e38140775ecfa79011f488_Group%201000002601.png)
Underwriting
Underwriters are under pressure to make decisions quickly, and sometimes critical risk checks are overlooked. The Coris platform's rule engine eliminates the risk of manual errors by automating checks and actions, increasing accuracy and efficiency.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e3817145495552c700647e_Group%2012677.png)
Transaction Monitoring
Fraudulent ACH returns - aka "friendly fraud" - negatively impact merchants and the software platforms that serve them. Our ACH fraud model automatically triangulates known information on payments and payers, and generates a score predicting the likelihood that the ACH payment might be returned.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6570f033beae2d428c9f4468/66e381b6d3b3b4bdd2bd9000_Icon%20-%20Commercial%20Credit%20\(1\).png)
Merchant Monitoring
Risk management doesn’t stop at onboarding. Risk teams can use the Coris platform to stay on top of suspicious activity by setting up custom alerts and checks for key events. For example, when a merchant initiates a payout, risk teams can check their chargeback history on Stripe Connect or Adyen for Platforms before deciding to release the payout.
Get in touch

generated_description:
**Coris: Revolutionizing Risk Management for SaaS and Fintech**

Founded in 2022 and based in San Francisco, Coris is carving a niche in the fintech landscape with its mission to provide sophisticated risk management solutions tailor-made for Software as a Service (SaaS) companies and fintechs that underwrite small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs). With a team of just two and backed by Y Combinator’s Batch S22, Coris has leveraged expert insights gained from its founders' experience in building risk systems at notable entities like eBay, PayPal, WePay, and Google.

Coris initially emerged as a Risk API focused on streamlining risk assessments for its clients. Within a remarkable timeframe of less than three months, they developed their product and quickly launched it. Currently, they're conducting live pilots with companies such as Housecall Pro and Wave Accounting.

### Addressing the Merchant Risk Challenge

Merchant risk management is facing a critical moment. There's an avalanche of unstructured data from merchants, and traditional tools simply aren't keeping pace, leading to significant gaps in the monitoring and evaluation process. Meanwhile, AI technologies are ushering in more sophisticated fraud tactics, leaving many risk management teams desperately playing catch-up.

Enter Coris. Their platform aims to unify and automate risk management processes across the entire merchant lifecycle—from onboarding to transaction monitoring. Using this system, companies can expect a **30% reduction in losses** in the first year, a **<5 seconds underwriting time**, and an **80% decrease in manual reviews**. What’s more, these efficiency gains can lead to a stunning **5x return on investment (ROI)** in year one.

### Key Features and Solutions

1. **MerchantProfiler**: This tool harnesses extensive data intelligence to provide insights into merchant classifications and compliance checks, helping businesses quickly vet potential clients.

2. **Fraud Detection**: Their platform includes groundbreaking models for detecting various forms of fraud during critical points such as onboarding and payment processing.

3. **Real-Time Monitoring**: Risk teams are equipped to manage ongoing merchant risks through customizable alerts and checks that ensure continuous oversight.

4. **Enhanced Workflow**: Coris integrates with existing systems (like Stripe and Adyen) to create seamless risk assessment pathways, ultimately reducing friction for legitimate clients while spotting concerning behavior efficiently.

### Why Teams Choose Coris

Client testimonials underscore the significant impact Coris is having on risk management. Companies report startling improvements, including:

- A **90% approval rate** on legitimate business applications.
- The **saving of 15 hours of onboarding work per week** per team.
- A **55% reduction in alert review times**, enabling teams to focus on critical, high-leverage risk responsibilities instead of getting bogged down in manual processes.

In a rapidly changing landscape where effective risk management is key to sustaining growth, Coris exemplifies innovation and responsiveness. Whether you’re entrenched in fintech or navigating the complexities of SaaS, Coris offers robust solutions that not only enhance security but also facilitate better business decisions. You can explore more about them at [coris.ai](https://coris.ai).
